featured.text: The old man could swallow because his throat was too dry.
When he was about to cut its throat, the little pig suddenly 38 , “Stop!”

definition.zh_def: 喉嚨，指的是連接口腔和食道的部分，負責吞嚥和發聲。
definition.en_def: The part of the neck in front of the vertebrae, which connects the mouth and esophagus, involved in swallowing and speaking.
definition.example: She cleared her throat before speaking to the audience.
